name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lotus - Your Daily Focus New Tab

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: What if Your Browser Became an Oasis of Calm, a Haven for Focus?

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Lotus, your new tab Chrome extension designed to transform your browsing into a journey of mindful productivity.

Imagine:
Zero distractions: A clean, serene interface that melts away clutter and lets you focus on what truly matters.
Calm and relaxing visuals: Breathe easy with soothing background themes that promote well-being and mental clarity.
A haven for focus: Unwind and conquer your day by defining clear, achievable goals at the start of each day. 
Instant access: Access your essential tools, bookmarks, and information instantly, without navigating multiple tabs.
Empower your decisions: Set intentions, prioritize tasks, and experience the satisfaction of progress and achievement.

It's time to reclaim your focus, cultivate a sense of accomplishment, and bloom into your most productive self.
Download Lotus now and start your journey to a more mindful, focused, and productive browsing experience!

You accept the TOS and Privacy Policy and agree to select “Lotus” as your new tab page by installing the "Lotus" extension.
Yahoo will offer the search tools that will be used in the Addon. However, your browser's default search settings won't alter due to the extension.
